normalised: what are the best exam prep apps for cracking competitive exams in india

normalised: so like many of you i am gearing up for competitive exams and drowning in textbooks trying to figure out the best way to study smart not just hard i have been experimenting with a bunch of exam prep apps and i am wondering what others are using and finding helpful

normalised: specifically i am looking at apps that cover exams like J E E N E E T maybe even something for U P S C down the line i need something that is more than just endless practice tests think good explanations maybe video lectures from experienced educators and ideally something that lets me track my progress effectively maybe even includes all india level mock tests to get a realistic rank prediction
